mapper.select: SELECT /*[ZoneDao.xml][selectDcList] 존관리의 물류창고 데이터들을 조회 */ BIZ_CD , DC_CD AS code , DC_NM AS name FROM tb_ms_dc WHERE 1=1
SELECT /*[ZoneDao.xml][selectDcAreaList] 존관리의 물류창고,구역 데이터들을 조회 */ BIZ_CD , DC_CD AS parent , AREA_CD AS code , AREA_NM AS name FROM tb_ms_area WHERE 1=1

SELECT /*[ZoneDao.xml][selectAreaList] 지역 데이터들을 조회 */ BIZ_CD , DC_CD , AREA_CD , ZONE_CD , ZONE_NM , KEEP_TYPE_CD , HOLD_ST_CD , REMARK , USE_YN , IN_DT , IN_USER_ID , UP_DT , UP_USER_ID FROM tb_ms_zone WHERE 1=1
AND ZONE_NM LIKE '%'#{codeCd}'%'
